```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
hw5_data_df = tibble(list.files("./data")) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(files_name = str_c("./data/", list_files_data)) %>% 
  select(-list_files_data)
```

```{r}
hw5_data_df %>% 
  mutate(data = map(files_name, read_csv)) %>% 
  bind_rows()
```
